verses.verse: And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work: <S%H4399><s%> it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of blowing <S%H8643><s%> the trumpets to you.

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals for a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals for a ram, <S%H352><s%>
And one <S%H259><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal for one <S%H259><s%> lamb, <S%H3532><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>
And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you:

Beside <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering of the month, <S%H2320><s%> and his meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the daily <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering, and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings, according to their manner, <S%H4941><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall have <S%H1961><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this <S%H2088><s%> seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> and you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls: <S%H5315><s%> you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein:

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell; <S%H7381><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%> they shall be to you without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%>
A several tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal for one <S%H259><s%> lamb, <S%H3532><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside <S%H905><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering of atonement, <S%H3725><s%> and the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering of it, and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> and you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%> they shall be without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to every <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to each <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>
And a several tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal to each <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings for the bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> shall be according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the manner: <S%H4941><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering thereof, and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings for the bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> shall be according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the manner: <S%H4941><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot: <S%H8549><s%>

And on <S%H5921><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6246><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

On <S%H5921><s%> the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a solemn <S%H6116><s%> assembly: <S%H6116><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein:

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

Their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings for the bullock, <S%H6499><s%> for the ram, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> shall be according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the manner: <S%H4941><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; beside <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

These <S%H428><s%> things you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in your set <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and your freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings, for your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and for your meat offerings, and for your drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings, and for your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
